s_all_trollies: SELECT id,trolleyName,trolleyNumber,tagId,maintenanceDate,maintenanceStatus FROM dbo.trolleymaintenancedetails order by maintenanceDate desc
s_search_trolley: SELECT id,trolleyName,trolleyNumber,tagId,maintenanceDate,maintenanceStatus FROM dbo.trolleymaintenancedetails where (trolleyName like '%{0}%' or trolleyNumber like '%{0}%' or tagId like '%{0}%' or maintenanceStatus like '%{0}%') order by maintenanceDate desc
